verbs.description: [ARG0: Peter Navarro , a top trade adviser for President Donald Trump ,] [V: apologized] [ARG1: for saying there was a " special place in hell " for Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] . Navarro is at the center of the trade fight with Canada .
